fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture, International co-operation and development, Environment, Youth, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Sustainable tourism, environment, development, culture 
participation in the debate on the so called overtourism; participation in European projects (in the frame of COSME); collaboration with the European network Necstour
organisation_name: European Alliance for Responsible Tourism and Hospitality (EARTH)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: Anna Lindh Foundation, Global Sustainable Tourism Council, ISTO, International Organization of Social Tourism
goals__remit:
Promoting the exchange of good practices along with tools available to both small and micro-enterprises for a sustainable and competitive tourism. 
 
Supporting EARTH network as interface medium to convey to its Members the core vision of the European Agenda on responsible and competitive tourism. 
 
Approval and implementation of a CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) system.
